src:
5 Hp Android Berkamera 48MP Dibawah Rp 4 Juta di Indonesia
01 Nov 2019, 01:54 by Mansur
5 HP Android Berkamera 48MP Paling Murah di Indonesia
Oketekno – Untuk sekarang ini lagi trending Smartphone dengan kamera 48MP, dan di Indonesia sendiri sudah ada beberapa HP Android yang menawarkan kemampuan kamera sebesar itu. Bukan cuman di segmen pasar kelas menengah saja, melainkan di kelas harga terjangkau ternyata juga banyak yang sudah memiliki kamera besar.
Mungkin kalian sekarang ini tengah mencari Smartphone dengan kelengkapan kamera sebesar 48MP, dan untuk budget yang dimiliki hanya Rp 4 juta saja. Jangan khawatir, karena dengan budget segitu sudah cukup untuk membeli ponsel-ponsel berikut, bahkan bisa beli 2 untuk model tertentu.

Baca Juga: 

Sederet HP Samsung Ini Lagi Diskon Jutaan Rupiah, Cek Daftarnya Disini!




OPPO A9 2020 (Rp 3.9 Juta)




Copyright©TechGenyz

Smartphone ini memiliki 4 kamera belakang, dimana untuk lensa kamera utamanya menggunakan sensor Samsung ISOCELL GM1 48MP. Sedangkan ketiga lensa kamera lainnya beresolusi 8MP OmniVision Ultra Wide + 2MP Mono Lens + 2MP Portrait Lens. Sedangkan untuk kamera selfie yang tertanamkan memiliki resolusi 16MP. Untuk mengetahui lebih banyak tentang spesifikasinya, bisa lanjut ke tautan ini.

Baca Juga: 

Segini Harga Resmi OPPO A9 2020 di Indonesia, Baterai Besar Bisa Jadi Powerbank




Realme 5 Pro (Rp 2.9 Juta)




Copyright©Techdaily

Hadir lebih dulu ketimbang Realme XT dengan kamera 64MP, Realme 5 Pro sekarang ini sudah mendapatkan sambutan yang cukup memuaskan dari masyarakat Indonesia. Ponsel ini punya kamera 48MP (SONY IMX586) + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. Sedangkan kamera selfie yang tertanamkan beresolusi 16MP juga. Lebih lanjut soal spesifikasi bisa langsung menuju link ini.

Baca Juga: Membandingkan Realme 5 Pro Vs Realme X, Harga Tidak Menjadi Patokan



Redmi Note 8 (Rp 1.9 Juta)




Copyright ©Inet Detik

Baru saja dijual di Indonesia pekan kemarin, dan Smartphone ini langsung ludes diserbu pembeli. Ponsel ini menawarkan 4 kamera belakang dengan sensor utama Samsung ISOCELL GM2 48MP, ditambah sensor ultra wide 8MP, 2MP Macro Lens dan 2MP Depth Sensor. Kamera selfie yang tertanamkan memiliki resolusi 13MP. Lebih lanjut tentang spesifikasinya bisa lihat disini.

Baca Juga: 

Redmi Note 8 Vs Realme 5, Siapa Raja HP Sejutaan yang Sebenarnya?




Samsung Galaxy M30s (Rp 3.2 Juta)




Copyright©zeebiz

Smartphone ini menawarkan kamera yang berbeda daripada ketiga HP Android sebelumnya, karena cuman ada 3 lensa kamera belakang. Masing-masing memiliki resolusi 48MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 5MP Depth Sensor. Sedangkan kamera selfie beresolusi 16MP. Lebih lanjut soal spesifikasi bica baca pada artikel ini.

Baca Juga: 

Pasti! Ini Dia Kapasitas Baterai Samsung Galaxy M30s




Redmi Note 7 (Rp 1.7 Juta)




Copyright ©Pinterest

Ini menjadi varian paling rendah yang bisa menjadi alternatif dalam pilihan HP Android berkamera 48MP di Indonesia. Redmi Note 7 menawarkan dual kamera saja, 48MP (ISOCELL GM1) + 5MP AI Depth Sensor, sedangkan kamera depannya beresolusi 13MP. Lebih lanjut bisa lihat disini.
Itulah beberapa HP Android dengan kamera 48MP yang bisa kalian beli di tahun ini. Selamat berbelanja.
baca juga: Membandingkan Redmi 7 dan Redmi Note 7 yang Cuma Selisih Rp 400 Ribu
text:
5 Android Mobile Cameras with 48MP Cameras Below Rp 4 Million in Indonesia
Nov 01 2019, 01:54 by Mansur
5 Cheapest Android 48MP Cameras in Indonesia
Oketekno - For now, it's trending a Smartphone with a 48MP camera, and in Indonesia alone there are a number of Android phones offering such a large camera capability. Not only in the middle class market segment, but in the affordable price class there are also many who already have large cameras.
Maybe you are currently looking for a smartphone with a camera equipped with a size of 48MP, and for a budget that is only Rp. 4 million. Do not worry, because with that much budget it is enough to buy the following phones, can even buy 2 for certain models.

Also Read:

A Row of Samsung Cellphones Again Million Rupiah Discounts, Check the List Here!




OPPO A9 2020 (Rp. 3.9 Million)




Copyright © TechGenyz

This smartphone has 4 rear cameras, where the main camera lens uses a Samsung ISOCELL GM1 48MP sensor. While the other three camera lenses are OmniVision Ultra Wide resolution + 2MP Mono Lens + 2MP Portrait Lens. As for the embedded selfie camera, it has a 16MP resolution. To find out more about the specifications, please go to this link.

Also Read:

As of this Official OPPO A9 2020 Price in Indonesia, a Large Battery Could Be a Powerbank




Realme 5 Pro (Rp. 2.9 Million)




Copyright © Techdaily

Present earlier than the Realme XT with a 64MP camera, Realme 5 Pro now has received quite satisfying welcome from the people of Indonesia. This phone has a 48MP camera (SONY IMX586) + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. While the embedded selfie camera resolution of 16MP as well. More about the specifications can go directly to this link.

Also Read: Comparing Realm 5 Pro Vs Realme X, Price Does Not Become a Benchmark



Redmi Note 8 (Rp. 1.9 Million)




Copyright © Inet Seconds

It was just sold in Indonesia last week, and this smartphone was sold out immediately invaded by buyers. This phone offers 4 rear cameras with Samsung ISOCELL GM2 48MP main sensor, plus an 8MP ultra wide sensor, 2MP Macro Lens and 2MP Depth Sensor. The embedded selfie camera has a 13MP resolution. More about the specifications can be seen here.

Also Read:

Redmi Note 8 Vs Realme 5, Who Is the True King of Millions?




Samsung Galaxy M30s (Rp. 3.2 Million)




Copyright © zeebiz

This smartphone offers a different camera than the three previous Android phones, because there are only 3 rear camera lenses. Each has a resolution of 48MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 5MP Depth Sensor. While the 16MP resolution selfie camera. More about the specifications bica read in this article.

Also Read:

Certainly! This is the Samsung Galaxy M30s Battery Capacity




Redmi Note 7 (IDR 1.7 Million)




Copyright © Pinterest

This is the lowest variant that could be an alternative in the choice of Android phones with 48MP cameras in Indonesia. Redmi Note 7 offers only dual cameras, 48MP (ISOCELL GM1) + 5MP AI Depth Sensor, while the front camera has a 13MP resolution. More can see here.
Those are some Android phones with 48MP cameras that you can buy this year. Happy shopping.
Also read: Comparing Redmi 7 and Redmi Note 7 with a Difference of only IDR 400 thousand
